Params: {3: 'Mountain bandits from a hillside town stand no chance against these three.'}
{3: 'Most of the bandits do not even have a chance to escape, and the masked woman who ambushed you is no exception.'}
{3: "When she wakes up, the tip of Vera's spear is already at her throat."}
{3: '【kuroname】 steps forward and removes her mask.'}
{3: 'The woman has a beautiful face, with willow-leaf eyebrows and almond-shaped eyes. Her face—'}
{3: 'You immediately think of the person you were tasked to find—'}
{2: '???', 3: "Stop hitting it so hard! You'll break it!", 18: '100003040'}
